response.original_title: Bernard Manning - An Audience With Bernard And Friends
response.overview: Had enough of hearing how great Man U are? Then join foul-mouthed northern comic Bernard Manning as he takes the club's fans to task with this live performance at the Embassy Club, Manchester. Aided by Talk Radio's James H. Reeve, Bernard gives the club - and late-coming guests 'Posh' and 'Becks' - what for, in his own inimitable fashion.
response.title: Bernard Manning - An Audience With Bernard And Friends
